content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (10, 20)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (11, 20)
- Boiler at position (10, 21)
- Offshore Pump at position (9, 20)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (15, 25)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 26) and a Furnace at position (16, 26)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 27) and a Furnace at position (16, 27)
- Burner Mining Drill at position (15, 28) and a Furnace at position (16, 28)

### Copper Cable Factory at Position (20, 30)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (20, 31) and a Furnace at position (21, 31)
- Assembling Machine at position (22, 30) and Inserter at position (21, 30) that puts into the Assembling Machine
- Beltgroup connecting the Furnace at position (21, 31) to the Assembling Machine at position (22, 30)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors in Incorrect API Usage
- Double-check the function signatures and ensure correct parameters are passed when calling API functions.

### Errors in Misaligned Conveyor Belts
- Align conveyor belts properly to ensure smooth transportation of materials between entities.
